original_text: “Then have them make a sanctuary for me, and I will dwell among them.
korean_text: 내가 그들 중에 거할 성소를 그들이 나를 위하여 짓되

sentences.original_text: Then have them make a sanctuary for me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나를 위하여 성소를 만들게 하라,

sentences.original_text: and I will dwell among them.
